title: Championship Sunday recap
itunes:title: Championship Sunday recap
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- recap Championship Sunday breaking down the Seahawks' historic comeback vs. the Packers and the Patriots' blowout of the Colts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
